meanings.definition: The quality of being very attentive to and concerned about accuracy and detail.
meanings.sent1: Her fastidiousnesses in checking every detail of the report ensured there were no errors.
meanings.sent2: His fastidiousnesses in arranging the books on the shelf by size and color was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The fastidiousnesses of the cat in grooming itself meticulously amused the children.
meanings.sent4: The fastidiousnesses of the artist in selecting the perfect shade of blue was like a painter's precision.
meanings.sent5: The fastidiousnesses of the chef in plating the dish made it look like a work of art.

meanings.definition: The state of being excessively particular, critical, or demanding.
meanings.sent1: Her fastidiousnesses in always wanting things done her way created tension in the team.
meanings.sent2: The fastidiousnesses of the customer in choosing the perfect gift made the salesperson's job challenging.
meanings.sent3: The fastidiousnesses of the toddler in selecting his toys caused a humorous scene at the store.
meanings.sent4: The fastidiousnesses of the judge in evaluating the evidence was like a magnifying glass on the case.
meanings.sent5: The fastidiousnesses of the editor in proofreading the manuscript made it error-free.
